statements: SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand, production_schedule FROM DemandForecasting;
SELECT production_schedule, forecasted_demand, product_id FROM DemandForecasting;
SELECT forecasted_demand, production_schedule, product_id FROM DemandForecasting;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecasting WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecasting WHERE forecasted_demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecasting ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC, product_id ASC
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecasting WHERE forecasted_demand > 100
SELECT product_id, production_schedule FROM DemandForecasting WHERE production_schedule LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT forecasted_demand, product_id FROM DemandForecasting WHERE forecasted_demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM DemandForecasting WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting;
SELECT product_id, demand_data FROM demand_forecasting WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, MAX(production_date) AS latest_production_date FROM production_schedule GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS num_schedules FROM production_schedule GROUP BY product_id HAVING num_schedules > 5;
SELECT schedule_id, product_id, production_date FROM production_schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, demand_data FROM demand_forecasting WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MAX(product_id) AS max_product_id, MIN(product_id) AS min_product_id FROM demand_forecasting;
SELECT schedule_id, product_id, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT product_id, date, forecast_amount FROM demand_forecast WHERE date = '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM historical_sales GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(forecast_amount) AS avg_forecast FROM demand_forecast
SELECT * FROM historical_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, product_id, sales_amount FROM historical_sales WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY sales_amount ASC;
SELECT date, forecast_amount FROM demand_forecast WHERE date >= '2023-01-01' AND forecast_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, product_id, quantity FROM production_schedule WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_id, date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM historical_sales WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM production_schedule WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT line_name, capacity_per_hour FROM production_line ORDER BY capacity_per_hour DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE demand_estimate > 100
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM production_schedule ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT production_date, forecast_date FROM production_schedule JOIN demand_forecast ON production_schedule.id = demand_forecast.product_id
SELECT line_name, SUM(capacity_per_hour) AS total_capacity FROM production_line GROUP BY line_name
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(forecasted_demand) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_demand > 1000;
SELECT date, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product.name, historical_data.date, historical_data.sales_quantity FROM product JOIN historical_data ON product.id = historical_data.product_id;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE production_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(forecasted_demand) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_demand > 1000;
SELECT p.name, ps.production_quantity FROM product p JOIN production_schedule ps ON p.id = ps.product_id WHERE ps.date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT h.date, h.sales_quantity, p.category FROM historical_data h JOIN product p ON h.product_id = p.id WHERE h.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY h.sales_quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT pp.product_id, pp.planned_quantity FROM production_plan pp WHERE pp.date > '2022-06-30';
